name: Earnescorrect Leader, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding on "Accurate Interval, Clarissa", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Aim to be the Strongest Idol!", reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits, draw a card, choose one of your rear-guards with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Strongly, nobly, beautifully! That is our motto!

name: Archangel of Twin Wings, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, choose a card from your bind zone, put it into your hand, and if you put a card, bind the top card of your deck face up. White Wings - [CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +１. Black Wings - [CONT](VC):During your turn, all your opponent's units get [Power] -5000. (White Wings is active when your bind only has odd grades, and Black Wings when it only has even grades)
flavor: The white wings gift happiness, while the black wings blow away boredom.

name: Heartfelt Song, Loronerol
effect: [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose a face up Song from your Order Zone, and sing it. (Activate the Song's ability, and turn it face down after that ability resolves)[AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if you have two or more face down cards in your Order Zone, choose a face up Song from your Order Zone, sing it, and until end of that battle, your opponent cannot call sentinels from hand to (GC).
flavor: With all my heart! Loro will sing with all her might!

name: Prismagica, Wilista
effect: [ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 "Truehearted Ruby"], and until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +15000, and your opponent cannot intercept. [ACT](VC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 "Everlasting Sapphire"], look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two unit cards from among them, call them to open (RC), discard the rest, and those units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: I'll definitely become a top idol!

name: Incessant Vocal, Elkel
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard is placed, [COST][bind this unit], and draw a card. [AUTO]:When this card is bound, your cards' White Wings and Black Wings are both active until the end of your opponent's next turn.
flavor: There are dreams that can be fulfilled, for sure!

name: Attentive Deep Love, Ottilie
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you play "Truehearted Ruby", if your vanguard is "Prismagica, Wilista", until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000, and you can play an additional order this turn. (It increases each time this ability is activated)
flavor: I know, that you have been trying harder than everyone.

name: Capriccio of Circulating Star, Ingrid
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than from hand, [Counter-Charge 1], choose one of your other rear-guards in the same column as this unit, and [Stand] it. [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit on the bottom of your deck. (This must be performed)
flavor: To be fully fledged is to be able to ad-lib to match our dear sister's whims.

name: Rondo of Eventide Moon, Feltyrosa
effect: [AUTO](VC):When your drive check reveals a  normal unit, you may call that unit to an open front row (RC). If you called, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets drive +1 until end of that battle. (Perform an additional drive check for this battle. You will perform an additional drive check even if this is the final drive check)
flavor: Won't you dance with me, while the moon shines in the night sky?

name: Honest Council President, Eknoa
effect: [AUTO](RC)[1/turn]:When this unit attacks, if your vanguard sung a Song this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn, then, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and draw two cards.
flavor: That girl, she's singing again today. She must really love singing.

name: Earnescorrect Member, Evelyn
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if your vanguard is "Earnescorrect Leader, Clarissa", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one grade 2 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name and reveal it, and if you do not have a rear-guard with the same card name as that card, call it to an open (RC). Shuffle your deck.
flavor: As the representative of the race -- be well aware of that.

name: Dedicated Serenade, Eleonore
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Power] +15000 until end of that battle. At the end of that battle, put this unit on the top of your deck.
flavor: One more song. Yes, as many songs as my dear sister wishes for.

name: Opposing Kindness, Virginia
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, if you played an order this turn, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: To show a tired face on stage, that's not even worth mentioning!

name: Brilliance and Elegance, Aerith
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks while boosted, if your vanguard is "Astesice, Kairi", [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose up to one card from your hand, and call it to an open (RC).
flavor: With that flawless conduct, she earned the admiration of countless students.

name: Unrelenting Talent, Henrietta
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit is boosted, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and until end of that battle, increase this unit's [Power] by the original [Shield] of the boosting unit.
flavor: Even if you stumble, you must always stand up to move forward again.

name: Fleeting Longing, Baruel
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades) - [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 3], choose one of your opponent's units for every two of your rear-guards with even grades, and they get [Power] -5000 until end of turn. Then, your opponent puts all of their rear-guards with [Power] ０ or less on the bottom of their deck in any order. (You cannot choose the same unit twice)
flavor: It may not reach. But even so, you should not stop aspiring.

name: Earnescorrect Supporter, Leona
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard with "Earnescorrect" in its card name is retired during your opponent's turn, if this unit is on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], and put that retired card into your hand.
flavor: Suddenly disappearing, that's terrible of you~.

name: Join Grasp, Ernesta
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC):When your other  is placed on (RC) during your battle phase, [Stand] this unit.
flavor: Overlapping hands. A dream-like moment.

name: Tranquil Affection, Elivira
effect: [AUTO](RC):When you play "Everlasting Sapphire", if your vanguard is "Prismagica, Wilista", draw a card.
flavor: The eyes filled with affection look towards tomorrow.

name: Wings with Rainbow Glow, Erimuel
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades) - [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your rear-guards for every three of your units with odd grades, and they get [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn. (You cannot choose the same unit twice)
flavor: Waiting on, one day, for sure.

name: Fighting Spirit Recharge!, Louisa
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, if your vanguard sung a Song this turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and if this unit is in the back row center column, [Counter-Charge 1].
flavor: Right after lessons, this is the best!

name: Aim to be the Strongest Idol!
effect: Play this if you have five or more units with "Earnescorrect" in their different card names!Until end of turn, all of your units with "Earnescorrect" in their card names get [Power] +5000. If your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, choose one of your "Earnescorrect Leader, Clarissa", and it gets "[CONT](VC):When this unit would attack, choose three of your opponent's (VC) or (RC), and this unit battles all of the units on the chosen circles.".
flavor: Together with everyone, we'll definitely make our dreams come true!

name: Six-Flower Fractale
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[AUTO]:When this card is put into the Order Zone, choose a face down card in your Order Zone, and you may turn it face up.[AUTO]Order Zone:When this Song is sung, choose the same number of your rear-guards as the number of face down cards in your Order Zone, and [Stand] them. Choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn for each unit [Stand] by this effect.
flavor:
A little more do I want to watch
The slow dance of the fairies' waltz

name: Greatest Star, Esteranza
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
flavor: With her arrival, idol activities became an art.

name: Mysterious Twins, Romia & Rumia
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
flavor: With overlapping smiles that charm, the super idols with differing personalities.

name: Demonic Fever, Garviera
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
flavor: Countless "fanatics" that drowned in her charm are found all over the world.

name: Fantastic Fur-nale, Catrina
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
flavor: Clearing a path to the new age, the carnivorous idols lead the way.

name: Blessing Diva, Grizael
effect: (You may only have one [Over] trigger in a deck. When revealed as a trigger, remove that card, draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +100 Million until end of turn! If revealed during drive check, activate its additional effect!)Additional Effect - During this fight, you get "During your turn, all your rear-guards get [Power] +10000"!
flavor: The archangel that descends onto the stage. The singing voice that tempts spectators to heaven.

name: Lovable Dress, Lija
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & put this unit on the bottom of your deck], draw a card, choose one of your units with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Able to get along well with anyone. That is why she is loved by everyone.

name: Selfie Practice, Anneliese
effect: [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, [COST][put this unit into your soul], choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: This looks better... No, maybe this angle... is better..?

name: Wish Fulfilled by a Pair, Milia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1], search your deck for up to one "Dreaming Pupils, Emeline", call it to an open (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Hmm~! Alright! Time to go for some self practice!

name: Powerful Dash, Andora
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, [COST][Counter-Blast 2], and this unit gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor: I'm confident! Let me do this!

name: Brainy Player, Bibbuel
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Soul-Blast 1 & Retire this unit], draw a card, choose up to one trigger unit from your bind zone, and it gets grade +1 until end of turn.White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades) - [CONT](RC)/(GC):This unit gets [Power] +5000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: The future can be changed. Always believe in that.

name: Earnescorrect Member, Katalyn
effect: [AUTO](RC):When the attack of the "Earnescorrect Leader, Clarissa" on your (VC) hits, [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & discard a card], and [Stand] this unit.
flavor: My lady's big moment, is something I would love to see.

name: Shining As-is, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a card from your bind zone, put it on the bottom of your deck, and if you put a card, bind the top card of your deck face up. White Wings - [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Critical] +１ until end of turn. Black Wings - [CONT](VC):During the battle this unit attacked, your opponent cannot call trigger units from hand to (GC).(White Wings is active when your bind only has odd grades, and Black Wings when it only has even grades)
flavor: Both versions of me, are all the real me...!

name: Talent of Enjoyment, Feltyrosa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, [COST][reveal a  normal unit from hand, and put it on the top of your deck], choose a  from your drop, and put it into your hand.[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have three or more  on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Don't just stay hidden there, come and join us here.

name: Accurate Interval, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding on "Serious Challenger, Clarissa", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Everyone's expectations, I'll not waste it!

name: Heavenly Recital, Emmael
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades) - [AUTO](RC):At the end of the battle this unit attacked while boosted, choose a card from your soul or rear-guards, and you may return it to your hand. If you chose from your soul, put this unit into your soul.
flavor: A gratifying piece that shakes the soul.

name: Blossoming Vocal, Loronerol
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your Order Zone has a face up Song, this unit gets [Power] +5000. [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, search your deck or hand for up to one grade 2 Song card, reveal it and put it into your Order Zone, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you put from your hand, draw a card.
flavor: Growing quickly~♪and raised healthily~♪

name: Expanding World, Wilista
effect: [AUTO](VC)[1/turn]:When you play a Gem card, draw a card. [CONT](GC):For every two Gem cards in your drop, this unit gets [Shield] +5000.
flavor: The days with new things just keep continuing... I'm really enjoying the present!

name: Mystic Voice, Renata
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose up to two Gem cards with the same card name in your drop, put one on the bottom of your deck, and put the rest into your soul.
flavor: A talent with outstanding singing capabilities, able to completely master any song.

name: Advent Stroke, Shedael
effect: [ACT](RC):[COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Put this unit into your soul], draw a card, choose up to one card from your bind zone, and it gets grade +1 until end of turn.Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades) - [CONT](RC):This unit cannot be chosen by your opponent's card effects, and cannot be attacked by your opponent's rear-guards.
flavor: I'll keep going, until I grasp it!

name: Sweet Tone, Kriemhild
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Hmm, I'll play it. Only if you pat my head, though.

name: Distinct Wordsense, Flor
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, reveal the top card of your deck, and if it is a unit card that is not grade 2, call it to an open (RC). If you did not call, put the revealed card on the bottom of your deck.
flavor: Pouring heart and soul into a flash of inspiration.

name: Mini-live After School, Katina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1 & discard a card from your hand], choose a Gem card from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: Yay♪ How was it? Wasn't that a clean ending?

name: Magnificent Timbre, Lyudia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & reveal two normal units from your hand, and put them on the bottom of your deck in any order], choose one of your vanguards, search your deck for up to one card with the same card name as that, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Echoing, high in the sky.

name: Cloudless Heart, Miael
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades) - [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 1 & Soul-Blast 1], choose a card with [Power] 8000 from your drop, and put it into your hand.
flavor: The song I learnt, I'll let you listen to it!

name: Determined Cheerfulness, Sarka
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: "Hating to lose" is a trait engraved in the dragons' blood.

name: Soapy Splash, Riviena
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Intruding is a no~no♡

name: Diva of Refreshing Calm, Christine
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Capturing everyone's heart, a clear singing voice.

name: Musical Committee, Nicolene
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: The things that you hate, why not forget them with a song?

name: Unwelcoming in Private, Desiel
effect: [CONT]:Sentinel(You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck)[AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your units, and it cannot be hit until end of that battle. If your hand has two or more cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Handshakes and chats, I'll refrain from them outside handshake events.

name: Fulfill Sweets, Angelma
effect: [AUTO]Back Row (RC)[1/turn]:When your other unit is placed on (RC) during your battle phase, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], and draw a card.
flavor: "Sweet treats" are an absolute essential for evening parties.

name: Earnescorrect Supporter, Trilby
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your vanguard's attack hits, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Did you see that! So that is our "battlefield"!

name: Blue-haired Prodigy, Receus
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of turn.
flavor: Glory is a momentary dream. Even so, its still a dream sought after.

name: Truehearted Ruby
effect: Play this with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw two cards, choose a card from your hand, and discard it. Put this card into your soul.
flavor: As though a flame is lit in their hearts--

name: Madder Red Runway
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[AUTO]:When this card is put into your Order Zone, if your opponent's vanguard is grade 3 or greater, draw a card. [AUTO]Order Zone:When this Song is sung, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Critical] +1 until end of turn.
flavor:
On this path that the stars carpet
With quick and nimble steps I tread

name: Twilight Sound of Waves
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[AUTO]:When this card is put into your Order Zone, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. [AUTO]Order Zone:When this Song is sung, all your front row units get [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor:
Waving my hand at you goodbye
Will we meet again after sunrise?

name: Windy Harmonica, Tertes
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Playing together with the winds, a pure ensemble.

name: Sophisticate, Teresia
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, if you played an order this turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: With her polished elegant conduct, she is the object of envy even within the school.

name: Relaxed Conversation, Philomena
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), you can play an additional order this turn. (It increases each time this ability is activated)
flavor: Come over here~. Let us chat~.

name: Stronger Yearning in the Heart, Florenzia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) other than from hand, until end of turn, when your opponent would call cards from hand to (GC) during the battle this unit attacked, they must call two or more at the same time.
flavor: The love she has for her dear sister is on another level.

name: Positive Singing, Louche
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your cards in your Order Zone.
flavor: Every single note, conscientiously.

name: Active Life, Jerry
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your unit with "Earnescorrect" in its card name is attacked, [COST][retire this unit], choose one of your units being attacked, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: You must also properly train your body. Being an idol is also a stamina showdown, y'know?

name: Midnight Lesson, Vannh
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [COST][Counter-Blast 2], look at five cards from the top of your deck, choose up to two trigger units from among them, call them to open (RC), and shuffle your deck.
flavor: Special night lesson, do you want to take it together?

name: Registering Emotions, Romana
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played "Truehearted Ruby" and "Everlasting Sapphire" this turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: The shape of emotions expressed in words. That will assist you greatly.

name: Flight to the Yonder, Cheluel
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades) - [AUTO](RC):When this unit attacks, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], [Soul-Charge 1], choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and that unit cannot [Stand] during the next stand phase.
flavor: Fly together with me! To the end of the skies!

name: Head Groupie, Marleen
effect: [CONT](RC)/(GC):If you have three or more  on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: For the bunch that approaches dear sister~ I'll hit them! With a punch!

name: Howling Ballad, Fanael
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades) - [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets "Boost" until end of turn.
flavor: While dancing elegantly, she sings of sadness.

name: Friendship, Hilda
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose up to one of your rear-guards with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, and return it to your hand. (Even if the unit being attacked is removed, drive checks and abilities that activate at the end of battle are performed)
flavor: Classmates are the strongest rivals, and also the greatest supporters.

name: Hair-braiding Aspiration, Heilwig
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) during your battle phase, [COST][put this unit into your soul], and draw a card.
flavor: Just by being beside, I am happy.

name: Loaded Sentiments, Evelina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose one of your units with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, and it gets [Power] +10000 until end of that battle.
flavor: By deepening one's understanding of the song, yet another level of emotion can be conveyed.

name: Charming Style, Tsetsilia
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC) from hand, if you have three or more other rear-guards, [COST][Counter-Blast 1], and draw a card.
flavor: With everyone gathered together, it looks really fun.

name: Dancing Score, Elmer
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Shield] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your cards in your Order Zone.
flavor: Overflowing, a torrent of emotions.

name: Best Rival, Train
effect: [CONT]Back Row (RC):This unit gets "Boost" and [Power] - 2000.
flavor: If she can do it, so can I!

name: Love-gazing, Tyrusiel
effect: Black Wings(Active when bind only has even grades) - [AUTO]:When this unit is put on (GC), choose one of your opponent's back row rear-guards, and [Rest] it.
flavor: I just, hope that you stay cheerful…

name: Candid Big Sister, Audrey
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your Order Zone has a card, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Hey, let's go?

name: Blooming Season, Rudi
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your rear-guard is returned to hand, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Lessons for various fields of art are held in the academy.

name: Tense Moment, Katie
effect: [CONT](VC/RC):During your opponent's turn, this unit gets [Power] -2000.
flavor: The announcement, ended without issues~. Phew…

name: Beautiful Day Off, Feltyrosa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], choose up to one  from your drop, and put it into your hand.[CONT](VC/RC):During your turn, if you have a  on your (RC), this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: Chosen to be the companion on an off day. That is an unparalleled honor.

name: Classy Breeze, Harriet
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if your Order Zone has two or more cards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: That is a really good song. Did you write it, by any chance?

name: Steady Progress, Pecoree
effect: [CONT](RC):During your turn, if you have a unit with "Earnescorrect" in its card name, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: The activities of current students, motivates the rest of the students.

name: Indecisive Sky, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), bind the top card of your deck. White Wings - [CONT](VC):When you would ride from your ride deck, you may "[Soul-Blast 1]" instead of "Choose a card from your hand, and discard it". Black Wings - [CONT](VC):All of your opponent's grade 1 or less rear-guards cannot attack this unit.(White Wings is active when your bind only has odd grades, and Black Wings when it only has even grades)
flavor: My feelings, which is the correct one...?

name: Scramble Sprint, Selma
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a vanguard, draw a card, choose a card from your hand, and discard it.
flavor: Nearly late, but keeping a smile even while sprinting full out.

name: Throbbing Search, Loronerol
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, search your deck or hand for up to one grade 1 Song card, reveal it and put it into your Order Zone, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you put from hand, draw a card.
flavor: While on a walk, the lyrics just came to me suddenly!

name: Proof of Hard Work, Wilista
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, [COST][put one card from your hand into your soul], search your deck for up to one Gem card, reveal it and put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck. [AUTO](RC):When you play an order, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: She knows, the true value of diligent effort.

name: Fleeting Maiden, Hannelore
effect: [AUTO](RC):When your other rear-guard is placed in the same column as this unit, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: M-me, at the evening party? Is it not a bother…?

name: Enthusiastic Noon, Chantal
effect: [ACT](RC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Times like this, they are the best~.

name: Advancing Courage, Bertieu
effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.
flavor: To change myself, I came all the way here….!

name: Precise Curriculum, Libuse
effect: [CONT](RC):If you played an order this turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000.
flavor: Next lesson is at the practical class building. Yours too, right? Let's go.

name: Serious Challenger, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding on "Dignified Will, Clarissa", look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 1 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you do not have any rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: This is the path I decided on. I'll definitely grab the chance to debut!

name: Little Peace, Prael
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades) - [CONT](RC)/(GC):This unit gets [Power] +2000/[Shield] +5000.
flavor: Putting anyone at ease unconsciously, a comforting voice.

name: Little Lady, Helmina
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have another  on your (RC), choose one of your rear-guards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: Having the reputation of treating souls roughly.

name: Dependable Senior, Aries
effect: [CONT](GC):If you have three or more open (RC), this unit gets [Shield] +10000.
flavor: Taking care of freshmen, is also a part of our duty.

name: Dreaming Pupils, Emeline
effect: [CONT](RC):If you have three or more other rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.
flavor: Yep! I'd also want to be like an idol that came out of a fairy tale!

name: Happiness Distribution, Danael
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades) - [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, [COST][Soul-Blast 2], choose one of your other units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn for each of your other units with odd grades.
flavor: Untainted pure white. A lucid sound that cleanses the heart.

name: Appassionato, Justine
effect: [AUTO]:When this card is discarded from your hand during your turn, [COST][Soul-Blast 1], and call this to an open (RC).
flavor: Ju-mp! Ehehe, are you surprised?

name: Sky-quivering Motion, Malibuel
effect: White Wings(Active when bind only has odd grades) - [CONT](RC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +10000.
flavor: I said it before, that I can do it even if solo, right?

name: Admired Dear Sister, Feltyrosa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Always elegant, as the "dear sister" of those girls.

name: To Deliver a Song, Loronerol
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Loro will… work much, much harder!

name: Brilliance in the Ore, Wilista
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: That step earlier! Once more!

name: Monochromic Personality, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Within the palms. There lay two possibilities.

name: Dignified Will, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
flavor: Discarding the promised tranquility, the young girl challenged her limits.

name: Original Style, Elshuka
flavor: Ready-made uniforms, are just not up to par.

name: Glutton, Nora
flavor: Fuafii? Fuofefuafafuefafiifuo?

name: Grinning Dragon Scale, Ilze
flavor: Things that I want to try, I found one more today.

name: Aplomb Sight, Grete
flavor: What is important is understanding what is being sought from us.

name: Diligent Follower, Siguel
flavor: I see~! This will definitely come in handy later!

name: Thick and Fluffy Siesta, Hilma
flavor: A dream-like tea time.

name: Glee Singing, Tetoel
flavor: Alright, line up! We'll be singing with a smile!

name: Spiritoso, Richalda
flavor: This here, it’s the moment to hype it up.

name: Running-start Youth, Haida
flavor: As if there's time to even stop!

name: Peaceful Garden, Anika
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Right here, is the garden filled with her kindness.

name: Soft Light, Pruel
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: No matter how vigorously you dance, if you collapse on stage, it's all wasted, you know?

name: Languid Relaxation, Marguerite
effect: (You may only have up to four [Heal] triggers in a deck)
flavor: Those snacks, you can eat them if you want~. Counting on you to refill though~.

name: Clean Clean
effect: Play this card with [COST][Counter-Blast 1]!Draw a card, choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor: With thanks to the school.

name: Everlasting Sapphire
effect: Choose one of your units, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn. Put this card into your soul.
flavor: As clear as the skies--

name: Vibrant Symphony
effect: If an attack hit your vanguard this turn, choose one of your units being attacked, and it gets [Power] +30000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Three, and!

name: Face-Off and Overcome
effect: Play this if your vanguard is "Archangel of Twin Wings, Alestiel"!Choose one of your units being attacked, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle for each of your rear-guards with odd grades. Until end of turn, when your unit with an even grade is retired from (RC) or (GC), you may put that card into your soul instead of drop.
flavor: Throw away your pessimism, and accept all of yourself.

name: Luminescence Fountain
effect: If you have three or more rear-guards, all your units being attacked get [Power] +15000 until end of that battle.
flavor: Unknowingly mesmerized. By the glittering beauty.

name: Romantic Happiness
effect: (After a Set Order is played, put it into your Order Zone.)[AUTO]Order Zone:When this Song is sung, draw a card, choose one of your vanguards, and it gets [Power] +5000 until end of turn.
flavor:
Nimbly turning    Within the palms
A new premonition

name: Accurate Interval, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding on "Serious Challenger, Clarissa", [COST][Soul-Blast 1], look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 2 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you have no rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Serious Challenger, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) by riding on "Dignified Will, Clarissa", look at seven cards from the top of your deck, choose up to one grade 1 or less card with "Earnescorrect" in its card name from among them, reveal it and put it into your hand, shuffle the rest and put them on the bottom of your deck.[CONT](VC):During your turn, if you do not have any rear-guards, this unit gets [Power] +5000.

name: Dignified Will, Clarissa
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Blossoming Vocal, Loronerol
effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if your Order Zone has a face up Song, this unit gets [Power] +5000. If you put from your hand, draw a card.

name: Throbbing Search, Loronerol
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, search your deck or hand for up to one grade 1 Song card, reveal it and put it into your Order Zone, and if you searched your deck, shuffle your deck. If you put from hand, draw a card.

name: To Deliver a Song, Loronerol
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.

name: Shining As-is, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), choose a card from your bind zone, put it on the bottom of your deck, and if you put a card, bind the top card of your deck face up. White Wings - [ACT](VC)[1/turn]:[COST][Counter-Blast 1], and this unit gets [Critical] +１ until end of turn. Black Wings - [CONT](VC):During the battle this unit attacked, your opponent cannot call trigger units from hand to (GC).

name: Indecisive Sky, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC), bind the top card of your deck. White Wings - [CONT](VC):When you would ride from your ride deck, you may "[Soul-Blast 1]" instead of "Choose a card from your hand, and discard it". Black Wings - [CONT](VC):All of your opponent's grade 1 or less rear-guards cannot attack this unit.

name: Monochromic Personality, Alestiel
effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is rode upon, if you went second, draw a card.
